info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 03 at 4:59PM EDT until July 03 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CAMDEN...NORTHWESTERN PASQUOTANK AND NORTHWESTERN CURRITUCK COUNTIES... At 459 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over South Mills, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... South Mills and Morgans Corner around 510 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Burnt Mills, Horseshoe, Lynchs Corner, Pierceville, Tar Corner, Sharon, Lilly, Lambs Corner and Johnsons Corner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
